jekyll website

http://oli.jp/2011/github-pages-workflow/

initial setup

in folder of website

git init
git checkout -b gh-pages
git add .
git commit -am init
git remote add origin git@github.com:andrewjmonks/rpi-setup.git
git push origin gh-pages

set default branch

./.git/config
